desc: Welcome to Milly and Me Apothecary, here you will find herbs, teas, tinctures, oils, salves, smudges, face and body scrubs, self care products and more, all made from herbs and flowers given to us by mother nature and foraged and gathered right here in the neighborhoods of Boston MA.

layout.text: Welcome to Milly and Me Apothecary

Thank You for coming to Milly and Me Apothecary. Here you will find herbs, teas, tinctures, oils, salves, smudges, face and body scrubs, self care products and more, all made from herbs and flowers given to us by mother nature and foraged and gathered right here in the neighborhoods of Boston.
